id.description: ID of the created payment. Value generated by PayPal.

intent.description: Payment intent. Must be set to sale for immediate payment, authorize to authorize a payment for capture later, or order to create an order.

payer.description: Source of the funds for this payment represented by a PayPal account or a direct credit card.

create_time.description: Payment creation time as defined in RFC 3339 Section 5.6. Value generated by PayPal.

update_time.description: Time that the resource was last updated. Value generated by PayPal.

state.description: Payment state. Must be one of the following: created; approved; failed; pending; canceled; or expired. Value generated by PayPal.

transactions.description: Transactional details including the amount and item details.
